### **SCENE SETTING:**
Central Perk coffee shop — daytime, warm interior lighting with visible neon signs and brick walls.

### **CHARACTERS PRESENT:**
Ross Geller: white button-up shirt - dark pants - dark, short hair - concerned expression
Rachel Green: light pink t-shirt - dark pants - brown hair in a bun - animated, leaning in
Phoebe Buffay: light-colored top - dark pants - blonde, shoulder-length hair - smiling
Chandler Bing: dark shirt with red patterned trim - blue jeans - dark, styled hair - serious expression
Joey Tribbiani: red jacket over white shirt - dark pants - dark, styled hair - surprised expression
Monica Geller: dark-colored top - dark pants - dark, shoulder-length hair - relaxed

### **ACTIONS AND INTERACTIONS:**
Rachel leans over Ross, pointing at a piece of paper he's holding, appearing excited and animated. Ross looks at the paper with a concerned expression. Chandler stands up from the couch and walks toward the bar area, looking serious. Joey sits at a small table, holding a piece of paper and looking up at Chandler with a surprised expression. Phoebe sits on the couch, smiling and holding a piece of paper. Monica sits on the couch, looking relaxed and observing the group.

### **OBJECTS AND PROPS:**

Orange couch (center of frame)

### **DIALOGUE CONTEXT:**
Ross discusses a letter or note with Rachel, who appears excited and leans in to read it. The conversation has a casual tone, with Ross appearing concerned and Rachel animated. Chandler and Joey react to the situation with surprise, while Monica observes from the couch.

### **TEMPORAL NOTES:**
Chandler stands up and walks toward the bar area
Joey sits at a small table and holds a piece of paper
Rachel leans over Ross, pointing at the paper
Phoebe sits on the couch, smiling and holding a piece of paper
chunk_00001.subtitles: ROSS: Here's little Ben nodding off. Aww, look at Aunt Monica's little boy. - Look, he's got Ross' haircut. - Oh, let me see. Oh, God! Is he just the sweetest thing? You must just want to kiss him all over. That would be nice. - Pfft. - Pardon? Nothing. Just a little extra air in my mouth. Pfft. Hey, Chan, can you help me out here? I promise I'll pay you back. Oh, yeah, right. Including the waffles last week... ...you now owe me... ...17 jillion dollars. I will, really, I'll pay you back this time. Where's the money coming from? I'm helping out at the NYU Med School with some, uh, research. What kind of research? Uh, just, you know, science.

Come on, you guys. It's not that big a deal. I just go down there every other day... ...and make my contribution to the project. Hey, but at the end of two weeks, I get $700! chunk_00004.subtitles: Is she becoming your special someone? I don't know. She's, uh... She's pretty great. Yeah? What does she think of your little science project? You think I'm gonna tell a girl I like that I'm also seeing a cup? The man's got a point. Well, the tough thing is, she really wants to have sex with me. Crazy bitch. I still got a week left in the program, and according to the rules... ...if I want to get the money, I'm not allowed to conduct any personal experiments... ...if you know what I mean. - Joey, we always know what you mean. PHOEBE: Hey. ROSS: Hey. How long did you think this barbecue was gonna last? I'm going to China. Jeez, you say one thing and, eh...

chunk_00005.subtitles: You're going to China? It's, uh, for the museum. Someone found a bone. We want the bone, they don't want us to have it. So I'm going to try to persuade them... It's a whole big "bone" thing. Anyway, I'm gonna be gone for, like, a week. So, uh, if you wanna reach me, you can't. So here's my itinerary. Um... - Here's a picture of me. - Oh, let me see. Could you take it to Carol's now and then and show it to Ben so he doesn't forget me? - Yeah. - Hi, Ben. I'm your father. I am The Head! Pahh! This barbecue's gonna be very fun. Is Rachel here? Um, I wanted to wish her a happy birthday before I left. - Oh, no, she's out having drinks with Carl. - Oh. Heh. Hey, who's Carl? - The guy she met at the coffeehouse? - No.

chunk_00006.subtitles: - The guy she met at the coffeehouse? - No. - See, there's this guy she met at... - The coffeehouse? Right. So you do know who he is. Heh. I'm gonna go say goodbye to the guys. chunk_00009.subtitles: Wow. Thank you. This one's from Joey. It feels like a book. I think it's a book. Feels like a book. And it's a book! It's Dr. Seuss! That book got me through some tough times. There is a little child inside this man. The doctors say if they remove it, he'll die. - Who's this from? - That's, uh, Ross'. Ah. [CLEARS THROAT] Oh, my God. He remembered. Remembered what? It was, like, months ago. We were walking by this antique store, and I saw this pin in the window. I told him it was just like one my grandmother had when I was little. Aw! I can't believe he remembered! Well, sure, but can you play it on a plane?

chunk_00011.subtitles: This is unbelievable. I mean, this is unbelievable. I know. This is really, really huge. No, it's not. It's small, it's tiny, it's petite, it's wee. Uh-uh. I don't think any of our lives will ever be the same ever again. Is there a mute button on this woman? I think this is so great! I mean, you and Ross! - Did you have any idea? - No, none. My first night in the city, he mentioned asking me out... ...but nothing ever happened, so I just... What else did he say? Does he want to go out with me? Given that he's desperately in love with you... ...he wouldn't mind getting a cup of coffee or something. Ross? All this time? - I've gotta talk to him. - He's in China! The country. Wait, his flight doesn't leave for 45 minutes. What about the time difference? From here to the airport?

chunk_00012.subtitles: What about the time difference? From here to the airport? Yes! - You're never gonna make it! - I've got to try. What are you gonna say to him? I don't know. CHANDLER: Maybe you shouldn't go. Right, because if you're gonna break his heart, that can wait. Yeah, but if it's good news, tell him now. Maybe I'll know when I see him. Here, look. All right, does this help? No. All I know is, I cannot wait a week. This is just too big. I've just got to talk to him. I've got... - I'll see you later. - I love you! Deal with me first! chunk_00013.subtitles: Ross! Ross. Excuse me, pardon me. - Hi. Your boarding pass? - Hi. No, I need to talk to my friend. Sorry, you're not allowed on the jetway unless you have a boarding pass. He just went on. He's right there, in the blue jacket! Can I just...? I'm sorry. Federal regulations! All right, um, then could you please just give him a message for me? Please? This is very important. All right. What's the message? Uh... I don't know. [SPEAKING IN FOREIGN LANGUAGE] Excuse me! Sir! Excuse me! Sir? - I have a message for you. - What? It's from Rachel. She loved the present. She'll see you when you get back. What? Toby, I don't know what she's talking about. There's no Rachel! Don't give me that deep freeze! [MELANIE MOANS] Oh, Joey, Joey, Joey!

### **TEMPORAL NOTES:**
None observed — characters remain in bed throughout the clip, with no significant movement or position changes.
chunk_00014.subtitles: Oh, Joey, Joey, Joey! I think I blacked out there for a minute. It was nothing. Well, now we gotta find something fun for you! [LAUGHING] Ahh, you know what? Forget about me. Let's, uh... Let's give you another turn. Me, again? Sure. Why not? Boy! Somebody's gonna get a big fruit basket tomorrow! I gotta tell you, you are nothing like I thought you would be. How do you mean? I just had you pegged as one of those guys who are always, "Me, me, me!" - Ha, ha. - But you... ...you're a giver. You're, like, the most generous man I ever met.
chunk_00014.episode: 1x24 - The One Where Rachel Finds Out

chunk_00015.caption:
### **SCENE SETTING:**
Monica’s apartment kitchen/living area — evening, warm artificial lighting with decorative balloons and party decorations visible.

### **CHARACTERS PRESENT:**

Monica Geller: light-colored sweater - patterned skirt - dark, shoulder-length hair - smiling, engaged
Phoebe Buffay: dark-colored dress with floral pattern - long blonde hair - concerned, arms crossed

### **ACTIONS AND INTERACTIONS:**
Rachel stands at the table, gesturing with her hands as she speaks to Monica, who holds a piece of wrapping paper and responds with a smile. Phoebe stands nearby with her arms crossed, looking on with a concerned expression. Monica then moves toward Phoebe and they share a hug, while Rachel watches them.

### **OBJECTS AND PROPS:**
- Cake: white with yellow frosting (on table)
- Coffee mugs: various colors (on table)
- Balloons: colorful (in background)
- Refrigerator: white, with photos and magnets (against wall)
- Flowers: orange and red (in vase near refrigerator)
- Wooden table: round, with chairs

### **DIALOGUE CONTEXT:**
Monica discusses wrapping paper with Rachel, suggesting they save it despite it being torn. Rachel expresses uncertainty about dating Ross, and Monica encourages her, joking that they’d be like “friends-in-law.” The conversation
chunk_00015.subtitles: You're, like, the most generous man I ever met. I mean, you're practically a woman. So, uh, Rach, do you want to save this wrapping paper? It's only a little torn. Are you gonna go for it with Ross, or should I throw it out? I don't know. Thought about it all of the way there... ...and I thought about it all the way back and, uh... You know, it's Ross! You know what I mean? It's Ross. - Sure! - Sure. I don't know. This is just my initial gut feeling... ...but I'm thinking... ...it'd be really great. Oh, my God, me too! Oh, we'd be like friends-in-law! The best part is you already know everything about him. It's like starting on the 15th date. But it would be like starting on the 15th date.
chunk_00015.episode: 1x24 - The One Where Rachel Finds Out

chunk_00016.subtitles: But it would be like starting on the 15th date. Another good point. No, I mean... At the 15th date, you're already in a "relationship-y" place. You're committed. Huh. What happens if it doesn't work out? - Why isn't it working out? - I don't know, sometimes it doesn't. Is he not cute enough for you? Does he not make enough money? - No, I'm just... - Maybe there's someone else. Is there? Is there someone else? - No, there is no one else. - Then why the hell... ...are you dumping my brother? - Wha...? - Hey, big... - Shh! [WHISPERS] Spender. She's still asleep. - So how'd it go? - It was amazing. You know how you think you're great in bed?

Chandler remains seated throughout the clip.
The scene briefly cuts to
chunk_00017.subtitles: You know how you think you're great in bed? The fact you'd even ask shows how little you know me. Well, it's like, last night I couldn't do the thing... ...that usually makes me great. So I had to do all this other stuff. And the response I got! Man, oh, man. It was like a ticker-tape parade! Yes I know. As it happens, my room is very close to the parade route. It was amazing, and not just for her. Uh-uh. For me too. It's like, all of a sudden, I'm blind... ...but all my other senses are heightened. You know? It's like, I was able to appreciate it... ...on another level. I didn't know you had another level. I know. Neither did I!

### **TEMPORAL NOTES:
chunk_00018.subtitles: - Hey, great skirts! Birthday present? - Yeah. - From who? - From you. I exchanged the blouse you got me. Well, it's the thought. Doesn't Ross' flight get in in a couple hours? At gate 27B? Uh, yeah. Monica, you know, I've been thinking about it. I've decided this Ross thing is not a good idea. - Why? - Because I feel... ...like I wouldn't just be going out with him. I would be going out with all of you. - Ugh, there'd be all this pressure and... - No pressure, no pressure! Nothing has even happened yet and you're already so... I'm not "so." I was a teensy bit weird at first... ...but I'll be good. I promise. [DOOR BUZZING] Who is it? CARL: It's me, Carl. Come on up. Behind my brother's back?

Rachel discusses a situation with Monica, who is animatedly explaining something. The conversation shifts
chunk_00019.subtitles: Is the kind of crazy thing you won't be hearing from me. - Seven hundred bucks. - All right, you did it. Do we have any fruit? [CHUCKLES] Man, hell of a two weeks, huh? You know what, though? I really feel I learned something. So you'll stick with this "it's all for her" thing? What, are you crazy? When a blind man gets his sight back, does he walk around like this? I'm just saying, if I see one more picture of Ed Begley Jr... ...in that stupid electric car... ...I'm gonna shoot myself! Don't get me wrong. I'm not against environmental issues, per se...
chunk_00019.episode: 1x24 - The One Where Rachel Finds Out

chunk_00020.caption:
### **SCENE SETTING:**
An outdoor patio or balcony area at night, featuring a brick wall backdrop and potted plants. Lighting is dim, artificial, and focused on the characters.

### **CHARACTERS PRESENT:**
Rachel Green: dark-colored top - hair in a messy bun - expression: concerned, emotional
Ross Geller: light-colored shirt - dark undershirt - hair: dark, short - expression: earnest, pleading

### **ACTIONS AND INTERACTIONS:**
Rachel sits at a stone bar counter, initially listening to a man in a suit, then becomes visibly upset and covers her face. Ross approaches her, holding her hand and speaking earnestly, trying to comfort her. The man in the suit (unidentified) stands beside Ross, looking on with a concerned expression. Rachel and Ross engage in a serious, emotional conversation, with Ross gesturing as he speaks and Rachel responding with visible distress.

### **OBJECTS AND PROPS:**
- Champagne flute: filled with liquid (on counter)
- Bottle: unclear type (on counter)
- Potted plants: tall, green (behind characters)
- Brick wall: textured, reddish-brown (background)
- Stone bar counter: dark, rough texture (characters are seated at)

### **DIALOGUE CONTEXT:**
Ross discusses his feelings for Rachel with her
chunk_00020.subtitles: Don't get me wrong. I'm not against environmental issues, per se... ...it's just that guy! I can't believe you'd rather go out with him than me. Excuse me, please. I'm trying to have a date here. Fine, just stop thinking about me. Can't do it, can you? So I'm thinking about you. So what? I don't get it. What do you see in this guy anyway? Well, he seems to be a very nice guy. I mean, come on, buddy! Get a real car! Rachel, come on. Give us a chance. - Ross, it's too hard. - No, no. Because it'll get weird for everyone else? Who cares about them? This is about us. I've been in love with you since the ninth grade. - You're, like, my best friend. - I know. - If we broke up, and I lost you... - Whoa. Why do you think we'll break up? Have you been involved with someone where you haven't broken up?
chunk_00020.episode: 1x24 - The One Where Rachel Finds Out

chunk_00021.caption:
### **SCENE SETTING:**
An outdoor patio or balcony area at night, featuring a brick wall backdrop and potted plants. The scene is illuminated by warm artificial lighting, creating a dim, intimate atmosphere.

### **CHARACTERS PRESENT:**
Ross Geller: light blue button-down shirt - unclear lower clothing - dark, short hair - serious, then surprised expression
Rachel Green: dark-colored t-shirt - unclear lower clothing - brown, shoulder-length hair in a messy updo - concerned, then shocked expression
Unidentified person: light-colored suit jacket - unclear lower clothing - light brown hair - concerned expression

### **ACTIONS AND INTERACTIONS:**
Ross Geller and Rachel Green are engaged in an intense conversation, standing close to each other. Ross gestures emphatically while speaking, and Rachel responds with animated hand movements and a concerned expression. They lean in and share a passionate kiss, after which Ross steps back, looking surprised. Rachel remains visibly shaken. An unidentified man in a suit approaches them, holding a glass, and begins talking to Rachel, who appears distressed and places a hand on her chest.

### **OBJECTS AND PROPS:**
- Wine bottle: golden-colored (on stone ledge)
- Wine glasses: clear (held by characters)
- Stone ledge: dark-colored (where characters stand)
- Brick wall: red (background)
- Potted plants: green (in background)

### **DIALOGUE CONTEXT:**
Ross Geller discusses a romantic relationship with Rachel Green, questioning if she is attracted to him. The conversation has a tense, emotional tone, with Ross appearing earnest and Rachel reacting with shock and concern. The unidentified man joins the conversation, appearing concerned as he speaks to
chunk_00021.subtitles: Have you been involved with someone where you haven't broken up? No. But it only has to happen once. You and I know we are perfect for each other. Right? So the only question is: Are you attracted to me? I don't know. I mean, I've never looked at you that way before. Well start looking. Wow. Exactly! And you just know I'm gonna be the guy... ...caught behind this hammerhead in traffic! - Right. - Heh. You're right. - You know what? - What? I forgot, I'm supposed to pick up a friend at the airport. I am so sorry. I'm so... If you want to stay and finish your drinks, please do.
chunk_00021.episode: 1x24 - The One Where Rachel Finds Out

chunk_00022.subtitles: If you want to stay and finish your drinks, please do. I'm sorry, I gotta go. I'm sorry. But... Excuse me! Pardon me! Excuse me. I'm sorry. Ha, ha. Toby, for God's sake, will you let it go? There's no Rachel! - Oh, hey. I got that. - Oh. - Thanks, sweetie. - No problem. I cannot wait for you to meet my friends. Really? You don't think they'll judge and ridicule me? No, they will. I just, uh... - Can't wait. Heh. - Can't wait. Come on, they're gonna love you.
